short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the new tab page with a random car background and provides a search feature using Microsoft Bing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Road Explorer" - a Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience with stunning car-themed backgrounds and a Microsoft Bing search input type.

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing Road Explorer extension, you agree to the User Terms and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Weave Innovative website:

User Terms: https://weave-innovative.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://weave-innovative.com/privacypolicy

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.

With "Road Explorer", you can transform your new tab window into a breathtaking view of cars and their surrounding landscapes. These inspiring backgrounds will help you to relax, clear your mind, and focus on your daily activities with a positive outlook.

We understand that browsing the web can be a stressful experience, but with "Road Explorer", you can enjoy a moment of tranquility and beauty during your busy day.
